cells.data:
# MD5 (outdated)
md5 /path/to/file
#or - with clutter -
openssl md5 /path/to/file

#SHA1
shasum /path/to/file
# expands - as of March 2017 - to
shasum -a 1 /path/to/file
# or - with clutter
openssl sha1 /path/to/file

# SHA256
shasum -a 256 /path/to/file
# or - with clutter -
openssl dgst -sha256 /path/to/file
